mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM review r JOIN payment p on r.APPROVAL_NUM = p.APPROVAL_NUM JOIN car_general_info c on p.SELL_NUM = c.SELL_NUM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT r.APPROVAL_NUM, r.USER_ID, p.SELL_NUM, i.img_url, r.EVALUATION, r.review_title, c.manu_date, r.file_name1, r.file_name2, r.file_name3, r.file_url, SUBSTR(c.manu_date,1,2) || '년' || substr(c.manu_date,3,4) || '월식' manu_date_char, c.mileage, c.fuel, c.brand, c.model, r.review_content, r.review_date FROM review r JOIN payment p on r.APPROVAL_NUM = p.APPROVAL_NUM JOIN car_general_info c on p.SELL_NUM = c.SELL_NUM JOIN car_images i on c.SELL_NUM = i.SELL_NUM AND i.img_url LIKE '%' || '_1.' || '%' AND r.del_state = 0 ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT r.APPROVAL_NUM, i.img_url, r.file_name1, r.file_name2, r.file_name3, r.file_url FROM car_images i JOIN payment p ON i.SELL_NUM = p.SELL_NUM JOIN review r ON p.APPROVAL_NUM = r.APPROVAL_NUM WHERE r.APPROVAL_NUM = #{approval_num} AND i.img_url LIKE '%' || '_1.' || '%'
